segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, and it’s actually kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the water, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she has no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it’ll take for her to notice the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is about to fall, but he’s so determined to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting, completely oblivious to the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is like a comedy of errors.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how absurd it all is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope no one gets hurt, but it’s hard not to find this amusing.
segments.speaker: PAR
